title: House of the Tragic Poet
description: The so-called "House of the Tragic Poet" (VI, 8, 3, 5) was built in the first century BC and has the plan of a classic "Samnite" house. The house was excavated in 1824. It lies at the corner of the Via delle Terme and the Via della Fullonica, across from the Forum Baths.

properties.title: OSM location of so-called "Casa del Poeta Tragico"
